direction.raw_text: Piper on top, Jonah's face looks like he ran into a barbed wire fence! He howls in pain and manages to slip a hand around her throat! Piper feels it. His fingers tighten. He shoves her away from him...she can no longer dig into his face. Her arms flail. Reaching for anything. Grasping. Her face turns red. Eyes bulge. Fuck. She claws his shirt open. And there...hanging around his neck is a small corkscrew. Chinese in design. She snatches it and -- SHUNK! Stabs it into Jonah's shoulder, twists it deeper in. He SCREAMS. Releasing her!

Milton squeezes the trigger. The back end of the Lincoln EXPLODES as -- --The Corvette rockets over the hilltop!

direction.raw_text: Milton lowers to the ground and crawls to the edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 88. A twenty foot drop off to the ravine floor below. The ravine is filled with giant oil derricks, like metallic T-Rex's, rising and falling to the SHRIEK of oiled metal. And in the center of this Jurassic gathering, a CROWD of people dance and sway around a giant bonfire. It is celebration, ritual and orgy rolled into one. Brawny cultists erect a makeshift stone altar. On the opposite side of the Oil-Rig ravine - the battered RV sits like a mobile command post.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was expecting less than twenty followers. There are forty down there. Fuck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton walks slowly back toward the Nova. His head lowered in deep thought. How does one man and a kid take on forty? Suddenly a look of alarm crosses his face! He jerks the ancient revolver and aims it ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Piper sits on the hood of the Nova next to the Accountant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I shoot you with this, you know what it means. No heaven. No hell. You cease to exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All the more reason to keep Ms. Piper in close proximity. You are old, Milton. You might miss again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't stop me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop you? Milton, you wouldn't be here without me, you ungrateful shit. That roadblock back there, that would have stopped you. So I want you to drop that iron God- Killer and say thank you. Milton stares. The Accountant, moves. Quickly. With a crisp flick, suddenly there's a blade at Piper's throat. She GASPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said, drop it and thank you. Milton puts up his hand, flings the revolver into the darkness behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't hurt her. Th-Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's better. He lowers the blade, but keeps Piper close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not the first to get out and I doubt you'll be the last but I gotta know, HOW did you get out with the God-Killer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just walked in and took it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm an old washed up lifer. Never occurred to'em that I was up to no good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wouldn't wanna be you when he finds out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's he gonna do? Not let me back in? Now, I gotta know. Why? Why help me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know why. It's because of those crazy fucks out there isn't it? They figured something out didn't they? Somehow they know how to summon a piece of hell to earth. The Accountant laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's cute. You haven't told her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She don't listen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Young Ms. Piper, let you in on a little secret. The Dark Lord? Satan? Beelzebub? Lucifer? Simply the warden of a very large prison. Quiet man, actually. Thoughtful. Well read. I happen to know the idea of sacrificing children in his honor annoys him greatly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then why? Why help me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Simple. Like the warden, we all have jobs to do. Getting you here makes my job easier. You get what you want, I get what I want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then help me, now. There are forty of them down there. You and I could--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --No. You want to save her then go do it. If you win, I win. If they take you down, I win. He hugs Piper closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You like butter on your popcorn? It's sure to be a grand show. Piper doesn't know what to say. The Accountant glances back at Milton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're still here? Milton, the clock is ticking. Midnight approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then get off my fuckin car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The RV door flings open revealing Jonah King. He walks with arrogance through the orgy around him, his followers turn to him with reverence. His name is WHISPERED like a secret. He approaches the make-shift stone altar where Skanky Gal holds the baby within a bundle of blankets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : the moon is full and ripe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's almost time. Skanky Gal nods. But there is hesitation in her eyes. She's grown attached to the baby. Jonah takes the baby, places her on the stone altar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My brothers and sisters, we have come so far. To this place where the dying earth bleeds its corrupt soul at our feet. From its death, it shall be reborn. As we will be. We who have survived the slings. The arrows. The revulsion of those too weak to believe. We have been cast out. And hunted. But no more. Followers gather, move in unison, dance, writhe, fuck. Tattoo approaches with an old rusty knife. It was probably elegant once. Now it is worthless. He hands it to Jonah. The Followers GASP in holy awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (raising the knife) With this sacrifice, no more will we be shunned. They say the meek will inherit. They LIE. We are not meek. We are chosen. The hounds of perdition will howl at our command. For now we...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: noise. No. An engine. Distant but thunderous. Heads turn. The sound echoes throughout the ravine then -- FOOOM! The NOVA ROCKETS from the cliff's edge! It plummets straight at the cultists! They scatter! But three are not so lucky, they vanish as the giant Chevy turns them to PULP! Jonah's jaw drops. This can't fuckin' be. Skanky Gal, grabs the baby and flees toward one of the giant oil derricks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton wears a mask of rage as he rips the Nova into a 180, his 357 aimed out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BOOM! KUHFWOOM! He's shooting Cultists in a barrel. But the Nova is the better weapon. He FLOORS it, then LOCKS the brakes, fishtailing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Nova's ass-end veers like a dragon's tail SMACKING cultists aside with BONE-SHATTERING brutality.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jonah grabs a shotgun from behind the altar, opens FIRE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill him! KILL HIM! Followers produce an assortment of firepower and RIDDLE the Nova with lead! Milton sights Jonah, ready to blow him to fuck, catches the reverend while he cocks the pump.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: can see Milton's got him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grits and pulls the 357's trigger: Click. Click.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Jonah fires a fresh round - barely missing as-- Milton GUNS the engine - SMASHES two followers head on. They fly up the hood, SMASH the glass - but shield him from another frontal assault. Their bodies RIDDLED with lead. The Cultists circle him to get a better shot. A Magnum is thrust into the driver's side window - right in Milton's face. He leans back just as the gun is FIRED. Milton yanks the wheel, reverses the Nova - wrenches the Magnum from the fucker's hand. The Cultist hangs on. Claws at Milton. Milton twirls the Magnum, gunslinger style. Jams the barrel into the Cultist's face and FIRES. Milton runs down any that get in his way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Accountant stands above the battle, Piper at his side. He can hear her heartbeat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to help him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He chose you, you know that. Fast car, spunky attitude. He put your life at risk and you still want to help him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then go. She rushes toward a goat path leading down to the valley below. Suddenly something catches her eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ancient Revolver. Without the slightest pause, Piper snatches it, spins and aims it right at... The Accountant's smiling face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on tight. It has quite a kick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I kill you, you can't take him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone else will come...someone else always comes. Piper considers, the SOUNDS of battle rising from below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Piper, he didn't steal that gun to kill me. He stole it to slow me down. He's getting what he wanted. Now, go to him. Before it's too late. Piper turns and scrambles down the goat path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton is ROARING in anger as the NOVA is PEPPERED with bullets and shotgun blasts. GLASS, SPARKS and CHAOS rain down on him. Steam and oil SPEW from the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ducking in the seat, unable to see, Milton fights to keep
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jonah BLASTS the front driver's side tire, SHREDDING it - 95. The NOVA pitches hard to the left, PIN-WHEELING right into an oil derrick. The SCREAM of metal on metal rips through the ravine. The Nova SCREECHES to a halt, tires SPIN, smoke spews, gas drips from the wreck. Jonah and the half a dozen remaining Cultists zero in around the Nova, guns trained on the driver's door. Jonah nods to Tattoo who approaches close to the ground, reaches out slowly and YANKS the door open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Tattoo is blown backwards by a shotgun blast!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill him! Jonah and his men open FIRE!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton SCREAMS as the Nova's cab turns into a warzone. He clambers deep inside the wreck. Praying they don't ignite the leaking fuel. Then the firing stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jonah and his men draw closer and closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Soon they'll have a direct shot right into the Nova's open driver's side door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The men spin to find Piper standing behind them, ancient revolver aimed into their group. She pulls the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Jesus wept. The KICKBACK blows Piper off her feet, the gun jerked from her hands. She lands on her back. Hard. The wind KNOCKED out of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The GOD SLUG slams into a cultist's stomach. It EXPLODES through him, and into the BATTERED RV BEHIND:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The RV goes nuclear - blows shrapnel and cultists helter skelter across the ravine, shredding the remaining five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is spattered with his men's blood, dives behind the wreck of the Nova.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...this has all gone to shit. He steadies himself, grips the shotgun and shoves it into the Nova's open driver's side door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Empty. The passenger door is open. Milton is gone. Jonah spins in all directions. Expecting a trick. But nothing. He rushes around the Nova to find... Milton crawling. Bleeding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skanky Gal cowers twenty yards away beneath an oil derrick. The baby wrapped in pink blankets in her arms. Jonah walks up oozing arrogance. He knows he's won. He places the barrel of the shotgun to Milton's chin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You lose. (LOOKS UP) Get over here! Skanky continues to cower. Doesn't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said get over here! I want him to watch me kill the kid! Skanky doesn't move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stupid bitch. Fine. Then just know I promise to kill her slowly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Jonah raises the barrel to Milton's forehead then... Someone near CLEARS HIS THROAT. Jonah turns, stares. The Accountant leans against the Nova's hulk. He winks. At Jonah's feet, Milton scrambles forward and we realize he wasn't crawling toward his grand-baby. He was crawling toward the ancient revolver. He snatches it, rolls onto his back as-- Jonah swings his gun toward Milton -- KAFOOM! The burning God Slug HITS JONAH IN THE FACE! Jonah's head is obliterated. The force yanks his headless body into the air, spins it sky-wards in a plume of flame. The Accountant moves away, watching as -- The burning corpse slaps onto the leaking wreck of the Nova.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with THUNDER clear to the heavens - the Nova
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: one final time, living up to it's name in a furious ball of fire that consumes whatever's left of Jonah King.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Piper SUCKS in air. Sits up. Fire lighting her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton?! He lies on his back several yards away. Piper rushes up, falls beside him. He's alive, mouth filled with blood. She takes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skanky Gal looks up to find... ...the Accountant standing over her. He holds out his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She hands him the baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm curious. Would you have let him do it? She opens her mouth to speak, says nothing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I thought. He turns and walks away from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you. Soon. Skanky bolts. Races off into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton...no... Milton struggles. His head lolls back and forth. Eyes flick around. Searching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where...where is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's here. The Accountant hands the baby to Milton. Milton stares at the tiny face. The big bright eyes. Innocent. Beautiful in every miraculous way. He places her in Piper's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep her safe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. Anyone tries to hurt her and I'll kill'em.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. That's why I chose you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They all turn toward the high cliff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WEBSTER climbs from the 69 Camaro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Webster will look after you both. As long as he can. And he'll keep trying long after he can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milton. This can't...you can't just give up. There's gotta be something we can do to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beat the devil? Nah. Never gonna happen. I'm askin more than I have a right to. I know it. But love her for me, Piper. Love her and make her yours. I don't have any right to ask for your promise...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I promise. Milton. I promise. Milton coughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. And like that. The life fades from his eyes. Piper holds the baby close, SOBS. She looks up at the Accountant. But he is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun glows to the east as -- --Piper cradles the baby as she climbs the goat path where Webster is waiting. He rushes to her, places an arm around her. Leads her toward the Camaro as -- EXT. OIL RIG RAVINE - DAWN CLOSE ON MILTON He twitches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . His one good eye opens. It rolls around then settles on something above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Accountant stands over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen better. Guess she doesn't know you can beat him, slow him, shoot him, even stop him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...But you can't kill a dead man. Milton sits up slowly. Bones CREAK. He holds his hand out. The Accountant takes it. Pulls him to his feet. They turn and walk toward the rising sun. They walk until they are just silhouettes against a bright yellow glow...then... ...they fade into the shimmering heat... ...and they are gone.
direction.name: direction
